content: Third quarter 2022 revenue reached a record high of $161 million, operating profit was $68 million and net income was $53 million or $1.12 per diluted share. According to market research firm, UBI, OLED shipments for IT products such as tablets, notebooks and monitors are expected to grow more than 400% in the next 5 years with unit shipments increasing to 48.8 million units in 2027, up from 9.5 million units in 2022. The Cost of OLED material sales in the third quarter of 2022 were $34 million, translating into material gross margins of 60%. Should we be thinking smartphone units for OLED and plus a certain percentage of your ending deferred revenues, I think, down to $94 million.
